main event: An object was observed hovering in Santa Barbara, California, on May 8, 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as oval shaped and about half the size of the moon., It was whitish in color and hovered at an altitude of 50 to 100 feet., The object remained stationary for 20 to 30 minutes before disappearing., No noise or exhaust was observed during the sighting., The observation was made using 7 x 50 binoculars.
witness description: civilians including an airman and a control tower operator at VAFB
